text: Slime & B is a collaborative commercial mixtape by American singer Chris Brown and rapper Young Thug. It was released on May 5, 2020 by CBE under exclusive licensing to RCA. The mixtape includes guest appearances from Gunna, Future, Too $hort, E-40, among others. "Go Crazy" was released as the mixtape's lead single. ==Background== Previously, Chris Brown and Young Thug collaborated on the official remix of Brown's song "Wrist", contained in OHB and Brown's collaborative mixtape Before the Trap: Nights in Tarzana,https://www.hotnewhiphop.com/chris-brown-before-the-trap-nights-in- tarzana-new-mixtape.116388.html on the free-released track "Dat Night", also featuring Trey Songz, and on "High End", a promotional single from Brown's eight studio album Heartbreak on a Full Moon, also featuring Future.https://edition.cnn.com/2020/05/05/entertainment/chris-brown-young- thug-trnd/index.html The mixtape was announced on April 6, 2020, by Brown on his Instagram account,https://www.complex.com/music/2020/04/chris-brown- teases-joint-mixtape-young-thug and on April 28, 2020, the title and release date set for Brown's 31st birthday were announced. The mixtape was entirely done at Brown's house during the COVID-19 pandemic.http://grmdaily.com/chris- brown-young-thug-announce-joint-mixtape After its release, Young Thug revealed that he recorded his verses in a day. == Critical reception == Kenan Draughorne of HipHopDX praised the mixtape, saying that on the project both artists "pair with each other beautifully, creating their best collaborative tape to date", defining it as a "fun-filled amusement park from start to finish, bursting with color from both the acclaimed vocalists and the production beneath them". Draughorne called "Go Crazy" the mixtape's best song. == Commercial performance == Slime & B debuted at number 55 on the US Billboard 200, the album debuted on the chart after only three days of activity on digital retailers and streaming services.https://www.billboard.com/charts/billboard-200/2020-05-16 In its second chart week, the album jumped at number 24 on Billboard 200, with earning 20,000 album-equivalent units.https://mobile.twitter.com/chartdata/status/1262403979859853313 ==Track listing== Credits adapted from Tidal.
